data.title: Introduction to “Lot” by Ward Moore within "My Favorite Science Fiction Story" edited by Martin H. Greenberg., 1999
data.text:
From the Collection:

The collection includes manuscripts, drafts, research notes, correspondence, and convention memorabilia documenting the career of internationally renowned science-fiction novelist and short story author, Connie Willis.

Jay Trask, Head of Archival Services, completed minimal processing on the collection. Kay Lowell, Archival Librarian, and the University Libraries Technical Services Department completed cataloging of the published materials.

Katie Shull, Lecturer, manages the arrangement and description of the Connie Willis papers.
